metadata.title: CVE-2023-1907 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in pgadmin. Users logging into pgAdmin running inserver mode using LDAP authentication may be attached to another user'ssession if multiple connection attempts occur simultaneously.

criterions.comment: pgadmin3 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
